item.title: DotCIO Network Maintenance on 05/14/2025 5pm to 7pm ET
item.description: DotCIO will be performing necessary maintenance on the core campus network on 05/14/2025 from 5:00PM to 7:00PM ET. This work will affect Wi-Fi and wired network connectivity and campus telephones in several areas, including the Armory/Mueller Center, CII, DCC, ECAV, Field House, JEC, Science Center, and the Student Union. Some individual areas will also experience brief network outages. Any issues after the above maintenance window, please submit a Support Request via https://itssc.rpi.edu

item.title: Webinars to be Included in Webex Suite
item.description:
The Webex Suite meeting platform will include Webinars as of May 29, 2025. All Webinars, including those scheduled prior to this date but running after May 29, will be run on the new platform. In order to utilize the new experience, the installed Webex App must be version 45.4 or newer. If you need assistance to update your Webex App, please submit a support request.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
